Info.Title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
Info.Writer: Mark Bomback, Rick Jaffa, Amanda Silver, Rick Jaffa (based on characters created by), Amanda Silver (based on characters created by)
Info.Actors: Andy Serkis, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman, Keri Russell
Info.Plot: A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 17 wins & 47 nominations.
